data.title: Dal Makhni Rice Box
data.description: Creamy Dal Makhni with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt. The most satisfying meal ever!

data.title: Amritsari Chole Chawal Box
data.description: Authentic Amritsari chole with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt

data.title: Dilli Wale Rajma Chawal Box
data.description: Really good Rajma served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt. Comfort meal at it's best!

data.title: Grilled Tikki Box
data.description: Grilled veg patty with a spicy masala curry; Served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt

data.title: Paneer Masala Box
data.description: Loads of creamy Paneer with a masaledaar curry; Served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt
